appearance.TITLE: New User Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Display a form contains all field to create new User. Submit form will post data to /user/create. If create successfully, please alert created success. If not, please display error message.

descriptions.description: Create new user in database by data from request.

appearance.TITLE: View Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: This view file will have 2 button: Edit, Delete. Edit button to get edit form at /post/edit/:id with id will be its ID. Delete button to get delete at /post/delete/:id with id will be its ID.

appearance.TITLE: Update Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Display form contains all the information of single Post record. Submit form will post data to /post/edit/:id. If updated successfully, please alert updated success. Otherwise, please display error message.

descriptions.description: Update the the information post by data from request.

appearance.TITLE: List All Screen
appearance.DESCRIPTION: Data will be displayed as a list, each of element will have three buttons to view, update and delete it. 'View' button will lead to get detail view of Post at /post/detail/:id with id will be its ID.'Update' button will lead to get edit form at /post/edit/:id with id will be its ID.'Delete' button will lead to get delete at /post/delete/:id with id will be its ID.Screen will have a search bar to search post by its name.

descriptions.description: Get all existing posts in database.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> Creation Screen
relationships.description: List of posts contains buttons to create or update new post.

relationships.title: List All Screen -> Update Screen
relationships.description: List of posts contains buttons to create or update post.
